name: Alita_Robot
description: Alita is a Telegram Group management bot made using Pyrogram and Python, which makes it modern and faster than most of the Telegram chat managers.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your telegram bot token, get from @Botfather in telegram.

APP_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for pyrogram base.

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your Telegram support group chat username where user's can contact in case of a problem..

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Event logs channel where bot will send updates. Starts with -100

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Saitama support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Channel where bot uodates will be posted!

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs whitelisted, cannot be restricted..

ENABLED_LOCALES.description: A space separated list of language which should be enabled in bot.

WORKERS.description: Number of workers to eun the bot.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is
